uri.title: URI
uri.description: links to an object loaded from an external resource. To load from the externals list, use the "external" scheme then the external's name followed by the object name as a query, example: "external:ExternalName?ObjectName"

fromEntity.title: FromEntity
fromEntity.description: the name of the entity to copy the component from

name.description: the object's name, important because it can be used to reference it
